version_description: + Fixes an issue with the upgrade to version 4 for users with very large amounts of photos
+ Fixes an issue with the upgrade to version 4 for users with very large amounts of photos
+ Fixes an issue that was sometimes causing a crash on app start
+ Fixes an issue that was sometimes causing a crash on app start
+ Fixes an issue that was sometimes preventing the synchronization of items saved using the "Save to Utiful" activity
+ Fixes an issue that was sometimes preventing the synchronization of items saved using the "Save to Utiful" activity

+ Fix for an issue that was sometimes causing the Backup & Sync to stop working
+ VoiceOver navigation for blind and low vision users

+ VoiceOver navigation for blind and low vision users

+ EXPORT FOLDERS TO DROPBOX (iOS 11): Select folders > "Export" > "Export to AirDrop, Files, etc." > "Save to Files" > Dropbox > choose the parent folder, tap "Add", and wait for Dropbox to complete the operation.

+ Possibility to share photos and videos from Utiful to the SanDisk iXpand Flash Drive, so you can directly transfer photos and videos to this external storage to create an archive.
+ Possibility to share photos and videos from Utiful to the SanDisk iXpand Flash Drive, so you can directly transfer photos and videos to this external storage to create an archive.

+ Fixes an issue with moving of folders into folder groups.

Recently added:

+ DRAG & DROP: Update for iPad users on iOS 11 and higher! Full support for Drag & Drop in Split View and Slide Over View! Easily drag photos and videos from

Recently added:

+ DRAG & DROP: Update for iPad users on iOS 11 and higher! Full support for Drag & Drop in Split View and Slide Over View! Easily drag photos and videos from
+ Fixed an issue that was causing a crash on iOS 9.
+ Fixed an issue that was causing a crash on iOS 9.
+ Fixes an iPad issue with Drag & Drop from Utiful to Affinity Photo.
+ Fixes an iPad issue with Drag & Drop from Utiful to Affinity Photo.

+ If you have shared albums in your Photos app, or if you use iTunes to sync photo albums from your computer to your iPhone’s/iPad’s Photos app, you will now be able to add photos to Utiful also from these albums.

+ If you have shared albums in your Photos app, or if you use iTunes to sync photo albums from your computer to your iPhone’s/iPad’s Photos app, you will now be able to add photos to Utiful also from these albums.

+ Important for Facebook group admins: The sharing option “Add to Facebook album” has been reworked and renamed to “Facebook group album” to make it even easier for you to add photos to your Facebook group albums.

+ Substantial improvements in the sync functionality
+ Sync status visible on home screen
+ Synced devices visible in Settings
+ Performance improvements
+ Adapted instructions for export to computer via iTunes
+ Fixes a crash that occurred

+ Substantial improvements in the sync functionality
+ Sync status visible on home screen
+ Synced devices visible in Settings
+ Performance improvements
+ Adapted instructions for export to computer via iTunes
+ Fixes a crash that occurred

+++ When you export photos or whole photo folders (e.g to your computer), the filename of the photos now contains the date and time when the photo was taken. Additionally, you can choose in the Settings whether exported photos should always be sorted by d

+++ When you export photos or whole photo folders (e.g to your computer), the filename of the photos now contains the date and time when the photo was taken. Additionally, you can choose in the Settings whether exported photos should always be sorted by d

+ Now you can search through your folders! :-) Simply swipe down on the main screen and start typing!

+ Are you already using folder groups to create sub-folders? We have now substantially improved the navigation and the look and feel of folder gro

+ Now you can search through your folders! :-) Simply swipe down on the main screen and start typing!

+ Are you already using folder groups to create sub-folders? We have now substantially improved the navigation and the look and feel of folder gro

+ Support for iOS 13 Dark Mode
+ Further integration with iOS 13
+ Minor bugfixes

+ Support for iOS 13 Dark Mode
+ Further integration with iOS 13
+ Minor bugfixes
+ Now you can annotate your pictures by using the native iOS markup tools - with your finger or also with your Apple Pencil! Simply open a picture and tap the Edit button!
+ Now you can annotate your pictures by using the native iOS markup tools - with your finger or also with your Apple Pencil! Simply open a picture and tap the Edit button!

+ Adapted the color of folder names so that they are easier to read
+ Additional confirmation when deleting folders to prevent accidental deletion
+ In a folder, press and hold on a photo’s thumbnail to show shortcuts for Copy, Duplicate, Share, Del

+ Adapted the color of folder names so that they are easier to read
+ Additional confirmation when deleting folders to prevent accidental deletion
+ In a folder, press and hold on a photo’s thumbnail to show shortcuts for Copy, Duplicate, Share, Del

+ You can now easily import folders from your Windows PC to Utiful via iTunes!
+ Minor bugfixes

+ You can now easily import folders from your Windows PC to Utiful via iTunes!
+ Minor bugfixes

+ A long-awaited feature added: Slideshow!
+ Scrolling through your pictures is now much smoother!

+ A long-awaited feature added: Slideshow!
+ Scrolling through your pictures is now much smoother!

+ If you have nested folder groups, you can now easily move a folder group one level up, out of its parent folder group. Enter "Organize" mode, tap on the parent folder group to open it, then tap on the child folder group and choose from the menu the opti

+ If you have nested folder groups, you can now easily move a folder group one level up, out of its parent folder group. Enter "Organize" mode, tap on the parent folder group to open it, then tap on the child folder group and choose from the menu the opti

+ Slideshow improvements
+ iOS 13.6 compatibility update
+ Minor bugfixes

+ Slideshow improvements
+ iOS 13.6 compatibility update
+ Minor bugfixes
+ Due to a compatibility issue, it was not possible to save photos to Utiful from other apps, we have now fixed that.
+ Due to a compatibility issue, it was not possible to save photos to Utiful from other apps, we have now fixed that.

+ You can now sort folders alphabetically!
+ Fixes a crash that occurred in special situations when organizing folders.

+ You can now sort folders alphabetically!
+ Fixes a crash that occurred in special situations when organizing folders.

+ When you are in the Photos app and saving photos to Utiful, the import works much faster now! (We also fixed a small bug due to which photos with deep fusion sometimes failed to get imported).
+ The iTunes export dialog was not well readable in Dark

+ When you are in the Photos app and saving photos to Utiful, the import works much faster now! (We also fixed a small bug due to which photos with deep fusion sometimes failed to get imported).
+ The iTunes export dialog was not well readable in Dark
+ Crop & Rotate: With the "Edit" button you can now not only annotate but also crop and rotate pictures!
+ Crop & Rotate: With the "Edit" button you can now not only annotate but also crop and rotate pictures!
+ Instagram Story: You can now share pictures from Utiful directly to your Instagram Story! Simply open a picture, tap Share and choose "Instagram Story".
+ Instagram Story: You can now share pictures from Utiful directly to your Instagram Story! Simply open a picture, tap Share and choose "Instagram Story".
+ RAW image formats are now fully supported (e.g. DNG, CR2, NEF etc.). The original RAW image format is kept when imported into Utiful and when exported out of Utiful.
+ RAW image formats are now fully supported (e.g. DNG, CR2, NEF etc.). The original RAW image format is kept when imported into Utiful and when exported out of Utiful.

+ RAW image formats are now fully supported (e.g. DNG, CR2, NEF etc.). The original RAW image format is kept when imported into Utiful and when exported out of Utiful.
+ Fixes a bug that leads to a "Import failed" message when importing photos on some

+ RAW image formats are now fully supported (e.g. DNG, CR2, NEF etc.). The original RAW image format is kept when imported into Utiful and when exported out of Utiful.
+ Fixes a bug that leads to a "Import failed" message when importing photos on some
